content.rendered:
Burn calories, save lives

Blood donation is a win-win situation.

These posters gave a healthy twist to the blood donation drives and raised awareness on the importance of regular blood donation to ensure a healthy life. Aster undertakes the responsibility to ensure safe blood for thousands of people, who receive life-saving transfusions every year.
